full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 138 of 262 1849 LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct MS. COMEY: Understood, your Honor. Q. Where would you see Mr. Alessi when you were flying out of Palm Beach? A. He would drive the car up to the airplane with passengers to either drop them off or to pick them up. Q. I want to go now, please, to page 48 of this same exhibit. I would like to direct your attention to flight 979. A. Okay. Q. Can you tell us, please, the date of this flight. A. This is May the 9th, 1997. Q. Where are you getting May and '97 from? A. May is at the top of the column and '97 is just above it. Q. Where were you flying from and where were you flying to? A. From Teterboro, New Jersey, to Santa Fe, New Mexico. Q. When you flew to Santa Fe, New Mexico, what's your understanding of where Jeffrey Epstein was staying? A. He stayed at his Zorro Ranch. Q. Is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is Jane a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is there anyone else who was a passenger on this flight? A. No. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019000

May is at the top of the column and '97 is just above it. Q. Where were you flying from and where were you flying to? A. From Teterboro, New Jersey, to Santa Fe, New Mexico. Q. When you flew to Santa Fe, New Mexico, what's your understanding of where Jeffrey Epstein was staying? A. He stayed at his Zorro Ranch. Q. Is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is Jane a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is there anyone else who was a passenger on this flight? A. No.
